name: Hungry Boys
description:
Follow me on twitter, instaand youtube!

Download for free now:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/de...

Music: Funny Song - Benjamin Tissot (also known as Bensound)
https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free...

Game Description:
Take control of a group of boys and destroy the oncoming enemy by crashing into them.

Challenge Mode:
Over 300 levels that test your strategic might against every combination of enemies available.

Infinite Mode:
Stop the onslaught by destroying the enemies before they get to the bottom of the screen. Earn stars and items which can be used to improve your boys.
